EmailTemplate.name: New DA Announcement for Great Lakes
EmailTemplate.subject: VinSolutions would like to announce Bobby Holmes as your new Dealer Advocate
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName}, My name is Bobby Holmes and effective immediately, I will be your new Dealer Advocate (VinPro) at VinSolutions. Pat Ecord has done an excellent job handling your account and I assure you that I will do the same. Pat has accepted a new position in the VinSolutions Development Department. We are excited for Pat and this is a well deserved move. He will take with him, the experience from support and assisting all of you to our Development team, which can only yield great things for you and VinSolutions.
Let me start by letting you know a little bit about me. I have been a key player in our VinSolutions support “VinCare” department for some time and have worked with many of you in the past. My in-depth knowledge of the system, many years of experience in support, account management and sales allows me to be a valued asset to your dealership and dealership’s personal. I enjoy digging in to the system, fixing issues and passing on my knowledge to others.
I would like to coordinate your support efforts, and assume the position as your primary point of contact on behalf of VinCare.
I will continue with your account as long as you are a client. It’s my ambition to be an asset to you and your team as you make this transition, and as long as you are a client.
My daily goal is to be available to your group for special concerns or questions. As I generally conduct calls of an hour or more with dealership account Admins and Managers, I may not be as readily available as our regular VinCare team. So please assist me by directing the bulk of your staff and their concerns to our VinCare department.
VinCare offers three options for assisting your staff with issues including, but not limited to: user administration, process editing, lead settings and distributions are welcome through any of these mediums.
•E-mail
Email your questions and issues to Vincare. Email address for support@vinsolutions.com
•Live Chat
Our VinCare team handles your live chat issues, which can be accessed by clicking the “support” link in the upper right corner of Motosnap.
•Phone
VinCare is available during the day (Monday thru Saturday) to take your phone calls at 1-800-980-7488.
My contact information is listed below. Please feel free to contact me with any questions or concerns, and I am looking forward to working with you in the near future!
Bobby Holmes
VinPro
